name: My name is Ansh Kapoor.
introduction: I was born and brought up in New Delhi. I am currently working as a software engineer. I am currently skilled in ReactJs, NodeJs and frontend web development Frameworks. My interests also include Machine Learning in python and Matlab.
hobbies: In my free time I enjoy going to gym and cycling around the city. I have travelled to several places like Goa, Chandigarh, Jaipur, Shimla and Mussouri. I enjoy trying their cuisine.
interests: I also enjoy doing computer animation and photography. I am adept at adobe phtoshop, premiere pro and after effects.
channels: I believe in spreading and disseminating knowledge as much as possible. I have several youtube channel realted to competitive exams like Gre, Gmat. I can speak Hindi, English and most recently German.
